Breadth-First.Explanation: General opening with no specific hypothesis, preparing for broad clue gathering
Descriptive observation of multiple architectural and contextual clues without narrowing down

Depth-First.Explanation: Derives a specific location hypothesis based on key neoclassical and quadriga features
Depth-First.KeyElement: Neoclassical gate with 5 passages, 6 Doric columns, quadriga sculpture

Depth-First.Explanation: Compares the hypothesis against other similar monuments to confirm distinctions
Depth-First.KeyElement: Arc de Triomphe, Wellington Arch, Siegestor differences

Depth-First.Explanation: Confirms and summarizes the precise location based on verification

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After broad observations, the model converges on a single hypothesis and begins detailed verification
